alert.note: Alert for Morgan; Walton (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 22 at 6:53PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Morgan and Walton Counties through 730 PM EDT... At 652 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Between, or near Monroe, moving southwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, pea sized hail, heavy rain, and frequent cloud to ground lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Monroe, Madison, Loganville, Social Circle, Walnut Grove, Rutledge, North High Shoals, Bostwick, Between, Good Hope, Jersey, Ebenezer, Bold Springs, Windsor, Nicholasville, Youth, Hard Labor Creek State Park, Pannell, Campton and Herndonville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
